content:
<@539495253418180618> quick question on https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/blob/main/specs/validator.md with the following lines:
`a validator should begin the external build process for an ExecutionPayloadHeader along with the local build process for an ExecutionPayload as soon as they know the required parameters to do so`

For `ExecutionPayload`, we do call fcu + payload attributue to give EE enough time to prepare the payload. For `ExecutionPayloadHeader`, afaik there's no way to trigger a build process. Don't we just call `getHeader` at the start of the slot? or even `start of the slot -  BUILDER_PROPOSAL_DELAY_TOLERANCE` to safely get the block out on time
